BackstoryDef.title: royal guardbot
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by an imperial research project in an effort to create the perfect royal guard android. [PAWN_pronoun] was programmed with extensive military knowledge and the secrets of imperial psycasters. However, [PAWN_possessive] distinguishing feature is the custom frame enhancing psychic resonance. But before the critical component, a core of Eltex coils, could be manufactured, the project lost all funding and [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned.

BackstoryDef.title: imperial servitor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was built to serve in an imperial household. [PAWN_pronoun] was implemented with advanced housekeeping routines and the ability to appropiately converse with guests. But when [PAWN_possessive] family was exiled after a dishonorable scandal, [PAWN_pronoun] had to adapt to a new dangerous life.

BackstoryDef.title: imperial warbot
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was built for the front lines of the imperial army. [PAWN_pronoun] was imprinted with top-tier combat behavior and efficient repair algorithms to be highly effective in battle. But [PAWN_pronoun] existence suddenly changed when an ambitious imperial official staged an anti-android campaign - with [PAWN_nameDef] as the scapegoat.
